SELECT COUNT(temp.ct) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS ct FROM tb_amect_type `at` LEFT JOIN tb_amect a ON `at`.id = a.type_id AND a.`status` = 1 WHERE 1=1
AND `at`.type LIKE '%${type}%'
GROUP BY `at`.id ) temp
